source:
Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
if 'prod' in Environment:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
else:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# ' + StorageAccount + '

#create dataframe for the stparcel lms table
stparcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stparcel.parquet/', format='parquet')
stparcel.createOrReplaceTempView("stparcel")

#Create DataFrame for the stlmstrack LMS Table
stlmstrack = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stlmstrack.parquet', format='parquet')
stlmstrack.createOrReplaceTempView("stlmstrack")

#create dataframe for the stconsignment lms table
stconsignment = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stconsignment.parquet/', format='parquet')
stconsignment.createOrReplaceTempView("stconsignment")

#create dataframe for the stwaybill lms table
stwaybill = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stwaybill.parquet/', format='parquet')
stwaybill.createOrReplaceTempView("stwaybill")

#create dataframe for the storder lms table
storder = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/storder.parquet/', format='parquet')
storder.createOrReplaceTempView("storder")

#Create DataFrame for the stloadparent LMS Table
stloadparent = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stloadparent.parquet', format='parquet')
stloadparent.createOrReplaceTempView("stloadparent")

#Create DataFrame for the stloadchild LMS Table
stloadchild = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stloadchild.parquet', format='parquet')
stloadchild.createOrReplaceTempView("stloadchild")

#Create DataFrame for the stcollection LMS Table
stcollection = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stcollection.parquet', format='parquet')
stcollection.createOrReplaceTempView("stcollection")

from pyspark.sql import Window
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
my_window = (Window.orderBy('daymonth').rowsBetween(Window.unboundedPreceding, 0))

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcel3myoy
AS
SELECT 
    *
FROM stparcel
WHERE 
(
    lms_parcel_pdate >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_parcel_pdate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
OR 
(
    lms_parcel_pdate >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_parcel_pdate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stconsignment3myoy_tmp1
AS
SELECT 
    lms_consignment_id
FROM stconsignment

WHERE 
(
    lms_consignment_cdate >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_consignment_cdate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
OR 
(
    lms_consignment_cdate >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_consignment_cdate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stconsignment3myoy_tmp2
AS
SELECT 
    lms_parcel_consignid as lms_consignment_id
FROM stparcel3myoy
WHERE lms_parcel_consignid IS NOT NULL
stconsignment3myoy_tmp3 = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM stconsignment3myoy_tmp1 UNION SELECT * FROM stconsignment3myoy_tmp2")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stconsignment3myoy
AS
SELECT 
    c.*
FROM stconsignment3myoy_tmp3 t
LEFT JOIN stconsignment c on c.lms_consignment_id = t.lms_consignment_id
WHERE c.lms_consignment_id IS NOT NULL

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stwaybill3myoy_tmp1
AS
SELECT 
    lms_waybill_id
FROM stwaybill
WHERE 
(
    lms_waybill_date >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_waybill_date <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
OR 
(
    lms_waybill_date >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_waybill_date <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stwaybill3myoy_tmp2
AS
SELECT 
    lms_parcel_waybillid as lms_waybill_id
FROM stparcel3myoy
stwaybill3myoy_tmp3 = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM stwaybill3myoy_tmp1 UNION SELECT * FROM stwaybill3myoy_tmp2")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stwaybill3myoy
AS
SELECT 
    w.*
FROM stwaybill3myoy_tmp3 t
LEFT JOIN stwaybill w on w.lms_waybill_id = t.lms_waybill_id
WHERE w.lms_waybill_id IS NOT NULL

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storder3myoy_tmp1
AS
SELECT 
    lms_order_id
FROM storder
WHERE 
(
    lms_order_hodate >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_order_hodate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
OR 
(
    lms_order_hodate >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_order_hodate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storder3myoy_tmp2
AS
SELECT 
    lms_parcel_waybillid as lms_waybill_id
FROM stparcel3myoy
storder3myoy_tmp3 = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM storder3myoy_tmp1 UNION SELECT * FROM storder3myoy_tmp2")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storder3myoy
AS
SELECT 
    o.*
FROM storder3myoy_tmp3 t
LEFT JOIN storder o on o.lms_order_id = t.lms_order_id
WHERE o.lms_order_id IS NOT NULL

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmstrack3myoy_tmp1
AS
SELECT 
    lms_track_parcelid,
    lms_track_loadid
FROM stlmstrack
WHERE 
(
    lms_track_opendt >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_track_opendt <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
OR 
(
    lms_track_opendt >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_track_opendt <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmstrack3myoy_tmp2
AS
SELECT 
    lms_parcel_id as lms_track_parcelid
FROM stparcel3myoy
stlmstrack3myoy_tmp3 = spark.sql("SELECT lms_track_parcelid FROM stlmstrack3myoy_tmp1 UNION SELECT * FROM stlmstrack3myoy_tmp2")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmstrack3myoy
AS
SELECT 
    t.*
FROM stlmstrack3myoy_tmp3 t1
LEFT JOIN stlmstrack t on t.lms_track_parcelid = t1.lms_track_parcelid
LOAD CHILD CURRENT AND PRIOR YEAR 3MONTHS

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stloadchild3myoy_tmp1
AS
SELECT 
    lms_loadchild_id,
    lms_loadchild_parentloadid
FROM stloadchild
WHERE 
(
    lms_loadchild_ldate >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_loadchild_ldate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
OR 
(
    lms_loadchild_ldate >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_loadchild_ldate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stloadchild3myoy_tmp2
AS
SELECT 
    lms_track_loadid as lms_loadchild_id
FROM stlmstrack3myoy_tmp
stloadchild3myoy_tmp3 = spark.sql("SELECT lms_loadchild_id FROM stloadchild3myoy_tmp1 UNION SELECT * FROM stloadchild3myoy_tmp2")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stloadchild3myoy
AS
SELECT 
    lc.*
FROM stloadchild3myoy_tmp3 t
LEFT JOIN stloadchild lc on lc.lms_loadchild_id = t.lms_loadchild_id
WHERE lc.lms_loadchild_id IS NOT NULL
AND lc.lms_loadchild_ldate IS NOT NULL
LOAD PARENT CURRENT AND PRIOR YEAR 3MONTHS

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stloadparent3myoy_tmp1
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    lms_loadchild_parentloadid as lms_loadparent_parentloadid
FROM stloadchild3myoy_tmp 
WHERE lms_loadchild_parentloadid IS NOT NULL

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stloadparent3myoy_tmp2
AS
SELECT 
    lms_track_loadid as lms_loadparent_parentloadid
FROM stlmstrack3myoy_tmp
stloadparent3myoy_tmp3 = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM stloadparent3myoy_tmp1 UNION SELECT * FROM stloadparent3myoy_tmp2")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stloadparent3myoy
AS
SELECT 
    lp.*
FROM stloadparent3myoy_tmp3 t
LEFT JOIN stloadparent lp on lp.lms_loadparent_parentloadid = t.lms_loadparent_parentloadid
WHERE lp.lms_loadparent_parentloadid IS NOT NULL

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stcollection3myoy
AS
SELECT 
    *
FROM stcollection
WHERE 
(
    lms_collect_date >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_collect_date <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
OR 
(
    lms_collect_date >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_collect_date <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_parcel_orderhodate, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_orderid) as lms_parcel_ho_orders_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_consignid) as lms_parcel_ho_consignments_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_id) as lms_parcel_ho_parcels_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_waybillid) as lms_parcel_ho_waybills_cy
    ,sum(lms_parcel_weight) as lms_parcel_ho_weight_cy
    ,sum(lms_parcel_chargeweight) as lms_parcel_ho_chargeweight_cy



FROM stparcel3myoy

WHERE 
(
    lms_parcel_orderhodate >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_parcel_orderhodate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)

GROUP BY date_format(lms_parcel_orderhodate, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurespy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_parcel_orderhodate, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_orderid) as lms_parcel_ho_orders_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_consignid) as lms_parcel_ho_consignments_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_id) as lms_parcel_ho_parcels_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_waybillid) as lms_parcel_ho_waybills_py
    ,sum(lms_parcel_weight) as lms_parcel_ho_weight_py
    ,sum(lms_parcel_chargeweight) as lms_parcel_ho_chargeweight_py



FROM stparcel3myoy

WHERE 
(
    lms_parcel_orderhodate >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_parcel_orderhodate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)

GROUP BY date_format(lms_parcel_orderhodate, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurescy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_parcel_pdate, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_orderid) as lms_parcel_p_orders_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_consignid) as lms_parcel_p_consignments_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_id) as lms_parcel_p_parcels_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_waybillid) as lms_parcel_p_waybills_cy
    ,sum(lms_parcel_weight) as lms_parcel_p_weight_cy
    ,sum(lms_parcel_chargeweight) as lms_parcel_p_chargeweight_cy



FROM stparcel3myoy

WHERE 
(
    lms_parcel_pdate >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_parcel_pdate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)

GROUP BY date_format(lms_parcel_pdate, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurespy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_parcel_pdate, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_orderid) as lms_parcel_p_orders_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_consignid) as lms_parcel_p_consignments_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_id) as lms_parcel_p_parcels_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_waybillid) as lms_parcel_p_waybills_py
    ,sum(lms_parcel_weight) as lms_parcel_p_weight_py
    ,sum(lms_parcel_chargeweight) as lms_parcel_p_chargeweight_py




FROM stparcel3myoy

WHERE 
(
    lms_parcel_pdate >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_parcel_pdate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)

GROUP BY date_format(lms_parcel_pdate, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurescy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_parcel_consignmentcdate, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_orderid) as lms_parcel_c_orders_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_consignid) as lms_parcel_c_consignments_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_id) as lms_parcel_c_parcels_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_waybillid) as lms_parcel_c_waybills_cy
    ,sum(lms_parcel_weight) as lms_parcel_c_weight_cy
    ,sum(lms_parcel_chargeweight) as lms_parcel_c_chargeweight_cy


FROM stparcel3myoy

WHERE 
(
    lms_parcel_consignmentcdate >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_parcel_consignmentcdate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)

GROUP BY date_format(lms_parcel_consignmentcdate, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurespy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_parcel_consignmentcdate, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_orderid) as lms_parcel_c_orders_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_consignid) as lms_parcel_c_consignments_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_id) as lms_parcel_c_parcels_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_waybillid) as lms_parcel_c_waybills_py
    ,sum(lms_parcel_weight) as lms_parcel_c_weight_py
    ,sum(lms_parcel_chargeweight) as lms_parcel_c_chargeweight_py



FROM stparcel3myoy

AND

)

GROUP BY date_format(lms_parcel_consignmentcdate, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurescy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_parcel_waybilldate, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_id) as lms_parcel_wb_parcels_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_waybillid) as lms_parcel_wb_waybills_cy
    ,sum(lms_parcel_weight) as lms_parcel_wb_weight_cy
    ,sum(lms_parcel_chargeweight) as lms_parcel_wb_chargeweight_cy

AND 
    lms_parcel_waybilldate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)

GROUP BY date_format(lms_parcel_waybilldate, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurespy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_parcel_waybilldate, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_id) as lms_parcel_wb_parcels_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_parcel_waybillid) as lms_parcel_wb_waybills_py
    ,sum(lms_parcel_weight) as lms_parcel_wb_weight_py
    ,sum(lms_parcel_chargeweight) as lms_parcel_wb_chargeweight_py

FROM stparcel3myoy

WHERE

AND 
    lms_parcel_waybilldate <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurescy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_track_opendt, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_track_loadid) as lms_track_t_totallinehaulloads_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_track_parcelid) as lms_track_t_totallinehaulparcels_cy
    ,sum(lms_track_parcelweight) as lms_track_t_totallinehaulweight_cy
    ,sum(lms_track_parcelchargeweight) as lms_track_t_totallinehaulchargeweight_cy

FROM stlmstrack3myoy

WHERE 
(
    lms_track_opendt >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_track_opendt <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
AND lms_track_tracktypeid = 2

GROUP BY date_format(lms_track_opendt, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurespy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_track_opendt, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_track_loadid) as lms_track_t_totallinehaulloads_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_track_parcelid) as lms_track_t_totallinehaulparcels_py
    ,sum(lms_track_parcelweight) as lms_track_t_totallinehaulweight_py
    ,sum(lms_track_parcelchargeweight) as lms_track_t_totallinehaulchargeweight_py


FROM stlmstrack3myoy

WHERE 
(
    lms_track_opendt >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_track_opendt <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
AND lms_track_tracktypeid = 2

GROUP BY date_format(lms_track_opendt, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurescy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_track_opendt, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_track_loadid) as lms_track_t_totaldistributionloads_cy
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_track_parcelid) as lms_track_t_totaldistributionparcels_cy
    ,sum(lms_track_parcelweight) as lms_track_t_totaldistributionweight_cy
    ,sum(lms_track_parcelchargeweight) as lms_track_t_totaldistributionchargeweight_cy


FROM stlmstrack3myoy

WHERE 
(
    lms_track_opendt >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_track_opendt <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
AND lms_track_tracktypeid = 6

GROUP BY date_format(lms_track_opendt, "MMdd")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurespy
AS
SELECT 
     date_format(lms_track_opendt, "MMdd") as daymonth
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_track_loadid) as lms_track_t_totaldistributionloads_py
    ,count(DISTINCT lms_track_parcelid) as lms_track_t_totaldistributionparcels_py
    ,sum(lms_track_parcelweight) as lms_track_t_totaldistributionweight_py
    ,sum(lms_track_parcelchargeweight) as lms_track_t_totaldistributionchargeweight_py


FROM stlmstrack3myoy

WHERE 
(
    lms_track_opendt >= (to_timestamp((year(current_date())-1)||'-'||(month(current_date())-3)||'-'||'01'))
AND 
    lms_track_opendt <= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||month(current_date())||'-'||day(current_date())||'T23:59:59'))
)
AND lms_track_tracktypeid = 6

GROUP BY date_format(lms_track_opendt, "MMdd")

# staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum
# staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurespycum
# staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurescycum
# staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurespycum
# staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurescycum
# staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurespycum
# staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurescycum
# staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurespycum
# staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurescycum
# staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurespycum
# staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurescycum
# staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurespycum

staggrigatemeasures = staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.join(staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurespycum,staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurespycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurescycum,staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurescycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurespycum,staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurespycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurescycum,staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurescycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurespycum,staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurespycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurescycum,staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurescycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurespycum,staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurespycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurescycum,staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurescycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurespycum,staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurespycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurescycum,staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurescycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.join(staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurespycum,staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurespycum.daymonth == staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurescycum.daymonth,"left" )\
.drop(staggrigateparcelbyordermeasurespycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurescycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigateparcelbyparcelmeasurespycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurescycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigateparcelbyconsignmentmeasurespycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurescycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigateparcelbywaybillmeasurespycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurescycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigatetrackbylinehaulloadmeasurespycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurescycum.daymonth)\
.drop(staggrigatetrackbydistributionloadmeasurespycum.daymonth)
